item.title: 最新消息：巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥（Francis Scott Key Bridge）周二早些时候遭到一艘轮船撞击，造成部分坍塌，车辆和人员被卷入水中。
item.description:
BREAKING: A ship struck Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge early Tuesday, causing a partial collapse and sending vehicles and people into the water, officials say. https://t.co/mCQSGhqvYB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：马里兰州官员称，巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥在发生 "事故 "后部分坍塌。
item.description:
BREAKING: Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge partially collapsed after an "incident," officials in Maryland say.

Police said there were "workers possibly in the water," after the collapse. https://t.co/kZvAY2y99z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 事态发展：马里兰州交通管理局表示，巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥在发生 "事故 "后已关闭交通。
item.description:
DEVELOPING: Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge has been closed to traffic following an "incident," the Maryland Transportation Authority said. https://t.co/KrtYhH5Rq3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在威尔士王妃凯特周五公开自己的癌症诊断结果后，哈里王子和苏塞克斯公爵夫妇梅根表示支持凯特。
item.description:
Prince Harry and Meghan, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, have offered their support for Kate, the Princess of Wales, after she opened up about her cancer diagnosis on Friday.https://t.co/vPUzKpDKAI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国农业部周一表示，得克萨斯州和堪萨斯州奶牛的牛奶禽流感检测结果呈阳性。
item.description:
Milk from dairy cows in Texas and Kansas has tested positive for bird flu, U.S. officials said Monday.

Based on findings from Texas, officials think the cows got the virus from infected wild birds, the USDA said. https://t.co/UANH7uxadN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国国税局（IRS）周一表示，美国约有 940,000 人可在 5 月 17 日之前提交报税表，申请 2020 税收年度无人认领的退税，全国范围内无人认领的退税总额超过 10 亿美元。
item.description:
The IRS said Monday that about 940,000 people in the U.S. have until May 17 to submit tax returns for unclaimed refunds for tax year 2020, which total more than $1 billion nationwide. https://t.co/rsWfXG0pEE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据估计，本周三晚开奖的强力球彩票头奖奖金为 8.65 亿美元，是该彩票历史上第五大头奖。
item.description:
The Powerball jackpot is now estimated at $865 million for the next drawing on Wednesday night, making it the fifth-largest prize in the history of the game.https://t.co/pj2J7qAoPv pic.twitter.com/qHFt5CQOo9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 田纳西州一家为约翰迪尔（John Deere）和雅马哈（Yamaha）等大公司生产零部件的制造商被勒令上缴 150 万美元的利润，因为劳工部发现该公司雇用儿童从事危险工作：
item.description:
A Tennessee parts manufacturer for major companies including John Deere and Yamaha has been ordered to turn over $1.5 million in profits after the Department of Labor found children employed in dangerous jobs.

Learn more: https://t.co/zOiBCZYYjW pic.twitter.com/5kYMsdY6jE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周一的大奖是强力球历史上第六大大奖。估计现金价值为 3.488 亿美元。
item.description:
No Powerball jackpot winners reported on Monday.

Monday's prize was the sixth-largest in Powerball history. The estimated cash value was $348.8 million.https://t.co/iizzGP1AHO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.description:
Joey Graziadei's journey to find love on "The Bachelor" came to a close during Monday night's dramatic finale.https://t.co/qv9IdGnGI7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 一名在妊娠 26 周时出生的 10 个月大的婴儿战胜了重重困难，从医院回到了家中。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 塔雷娅-约翰逊（Tareasa Johnson）在 TikTok 上发布的帖子引起了热议，这些帖子记录了她与一个男人结婚时的挣扎，她声称这个男人是个病态的骗子。
item.description:
Tareasa Johnson went viral over her TikTok posts chronicling her struggle of marrying a man who she claims turned out to be a pathological liar.

"Impact x @Nightline" takes a look at Johnson's story and the accounts of victims who said they were tricked. https://t.co/okheclVRF8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 纽约市官员表示，纽约市计划加强对地铁逃票者的打击力度，部署至少 800 名警察专门负责监控旋转栅门。
item.description:
NYC plans to intensify a crackdown on subway fare evaders by deploying at least 800 police officers specifically to monitor turnstiles, officials say.

It's the latest move to address concerns about crime and safety in the nation's busiest subway system. https://t.co/sx9V8jOwWa pic.twitter.com/RzqF1jN7Ck

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 这匹马清晨在佛罗里达州奥卡拉（Ocala）松脱并被警方追捕，警方安全地将它关进了笼子。
item.description:
Police safely corralled this horse after it got loose and led authorities on an early morning pursuit in Ocala, Florida.

The horse was reunited with its owner on the same day. pic.twitter.com/1ZI3r87WJb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在一段延时摄影视频中捕捉到两种最令人敬畏的国家现象：冰岛格林达维克镇附近的一座火山在北极光的映衬下喷发。
item.description:
Two of the most awe-inspiring national phenomena captured in one timelapse video: A volcano near the Icelandic town of Grindavik erupts against the backdrop of the Northern Lights. https://t.co/SQ6854DKS8 pic.twitter.com/bWZBER3b4w

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 全国各地的几个变装皇后故事时间都面临着炸弹威胁、反弹和取消。上周六，宾夕法尼亚州兰开斯特公共图书馆成为最近一个受到此类威胁影响的图书馆：
item.description:
Several drag queen story hours across the country have been faced with bomb threats, backlash and cancellations. On Saturday, Lancaster Public Library in Pennsylvania became the latest to be impacted by such threats.

Learn more: https://t.co/sUkhfUT6ve pic.twitter.com/ZLwThYBLPJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 布鲁斯-斯普林斯汀（Bruce Springsteen）在与 E 街乐队（E Street Band）重新启动巡演后发表了自己的看法，此前他曾因被诊断出患有消化性溃疡病而休息了六个月。
item.description:
Bruce Springsteen is speaking out after relaunching his tour with the E Street Band following a six-month break to deal with a diagnosis of peptic ulcer disease.

He revealed that during the worst stages of his condition, he wasn't able to sing at all.https://t.co/ctyn9953ik

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国一家野生动物园的北美黑熊喜欢探索它们围栏里的新成员，因为潮湿的天气在附近留下了一大滩水：一只天鹅形状的脚踏船。
item.description:
A sleuth of North American black bears at a safari park in the U.K. enjoyed exploring a new addition to their enclosure after wet weather left a large pool of water nearby: a swan-shaped pedal boat. https://t.co/jPIC4udWst pic.twitter.com/SbnAL7saC3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 好消息：奇迹宝宝 "艾丽娅娜-洛佩兹（Ellyannah Lopez）出生后在医院住了 10 个月，现在终于可以回家了。

item.title: 最新消息：一名阿米什孕妇 2 岁的女儿和 3 岁的儿子在家时，他们的母亲被残忍地袭击并杀害：
item.description:
JUST IN: A pregnant Amish woman's 2-year-old daughter and 3-year-old son were home when their mom was brutally attacked and killed.

Read more: https://t.co/kU2xWU1khi pic.twitter.com/iYREuKh30t

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 根据最新公布的法庭文件，一名阿米什族孕妇被袭身亡时，她 2 岁的女儿和 3 岁的儿子都在家，其中 3 岁的儿子还看到了凶手。
item.description:
A pregnant Amish woman's 2-year-old daughter and 3-year-old son were home when she was attacked and killed, and the 3-year-old saw the killer, according to newly unsealed court documents.https://t.co/aPg5E3tMf6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 有进展据熟悉内情的执法部门消息人士透露，作为纽约南区联邦人口贩运调查的一部分，执法部门正在对 Diddy 的房产进行搜查。
item.description:
DEVELOPING: Law enforcement searches are being carried out at Diddy’s properties as part of a federal investigation into human trafficking being led out of the Southern District of New York, according to law enforcement sources familiar with the matter. https://t.co/Tpd1t4G2Y3 pic.twitter.com/RBseUcRban

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据当局称，迪迪在洛杉矶和迈阿密的住所于周一遭到联邦特工的突袭。
item.description:
